H0.text: In the 1960s, Margaret Rutherford starred in four films as which famous detective. Nancy Drew

H1.text: In the 1960s, Margaret Rutherford starred in four films as which famous detective. Miss Hathaway

H2.text: In the 1960s, Margaret Rutherford starred in four films as which famous detective. Phryne Fisher

H3.text: In the 1960s, Margaret Rutherford starred in four films as which famous detective. Ms Marple

A4.text: Margaret Rutherford played Miss Marple in four films directed by George Pollock between 1961 and 1964.

A5.text: The first on-screen portrayal of Miss Marple was by Gracie Fields in a 1956 episode of Goodyear TV Playhouse.
